Package com.alticelabs.ccp.exagon.api.workflow.command

Enum Class ExagonCommandQualifier

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<ExagonCommandQualifier>
com.alticelabs.ccp.exagon.api.workflow.command.ExagonCommandQualifier
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<ExagonCommandQualifier>, Constable
public enum ExagonCommandQualifier extends Enum<ExagonCommandQualifier>
Enumeration of the command qualifiers supported by Exagon. Used in BusinessCommand.

  • Enum Constant Details

    • PoNR

      public static final ExagonCommandQualifier PoNR
      Marks the point where the operations of a Saga flow become irreversible. Short for "Point of No Return".

      After this point, sending network replies is encouraged.

      When Exagon receives this qualifier, it stops the initial Saga timeout, disables Saga isolation, and starts a post-processing timeout.

    • INTERNAL

      public static final ExagonCommandQualifier INTERNAL
      Indicates that the command should be processed internally, i.e., in the same Exagon orchestrator that dispatched the command.

      When Exagon receives this qualifier, it redirects the current command to the protocol mapper that participated in the Saga execution, i.e., the protocol mapper from the same Exagon orchestrator that received and converted the external network event with the convertExternalRequest. This protocol mapper should contain a method annotated with ExagonCommandHandler and with the respective command as argument.

    • POLYMORPHIC

      public static final ExagonCommandQualifier POLYMORPHIC
      Indicates that the command triggers the processing of a dynamic set of notifications. Business commands with this qualifier also have a list of arguments representing the notifications required. Useful on scenarios where some notifications may be optional depending on the business logic.

      When Exagon receives this qualifier, it will only wait for the notifications listed and disregard the notification parameters from the methods annotated with ExagonCommandHandler. The parameters absent in the notification set required will receive a null value.

    • FINAL

      public static final ExagonCommandQualifier FINAL
      Marks the point where the Saga flow reached the end.

      When Exagon receives this qualifier, it stops the post-processing timeout and finishes the Saga execution.
